verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>, to bring to remembrance <WH2142> <WH8687>. O YY <WH3068>, rebuke <WH3198> <WH8686> me not in thy wrath <WH7110>: neither chasten <WH3256> <WH8762> me in thy hot displeasure <WH2534>.
For thine arrows <WH2671> stick fast <WH5181> <WH8738> in me, and thy hand <WH3027> presseht me sore <WH5181> <WH8799>.
There is no soundness <WH4974> in my flesh <WH1320> because <WH6440> of thine anger <WH2195>; neither is there any rest <WH7965> in my bones <WH6106> because <WH6440> of my sin <WH2403>.
For mine iniquities <WH5771> are gone over <WH5674> <WH8804> mine head <WH7218>: as an heavy <WH3515> burden <WH4853> they are too heavy <WH3513> <WH8799> for me.
My wounds <WH2250> stink <WH887> <WH8689> and are corrupt <WH4743> <WH8738> because <WH6440> of my foolishness <WH200>.
I am troubled <WH5753> <WH8738>; I am bowed down <WH7817> <WH8804> greatly <WH3966>; I go <WH1980> <WH8765> mourning <WH6937> <WH8802> all the day <WH3117> long.
For my loins <WH3689> are filled <WH4390> <WH8804> with a loathsome <WH7033> <WH8737> disease: and there is no soundness <WH4974> in my flesh <WH1320>.
I am feeble <WH6313> <WH8738> and sore <WH3966> broken <WH1794> <WH8738>: I have roared <WH7580> <WH8804> by reason of the disquietness <WH5100> of my heart <WH3820>.
YY <WH136>, all my desire <WH8378> is before thee; and my groaning <WH585> is not hid <WH5641> <WH8738> from thee.
My heart <WH3820> panteth <WH5503> <WH8773>, my strength <WH3581> faileth <WH5800> <WH8804> me: as for the light <WH216> of mine eyes <WH5869>, it <WH1992> also is gone <WH369> from me.
My lovers <WH157> <WH8802> and my friends <WH7453> stand <WH5975> <WH8799> aloof from <WH5048> my sore <WH5061>; and my kinsmen <WH7138> stand <WH5975> <WH8804> afar off <WH7350>.

They also that seek <WH1245> <WH8764> after my life <WH5315> lay snares <WH5367> <WH8762> for me: and they that seek <WH1875> <WH8802> my hurt <WH7451> speak <WH1696> <WH8765> mischievous things <WH1942>, and imagine <WH1897> <WH8799> deceits <WH4820> all the day <WH3117> long.
But I, as a deaf <WH2795> man, heard <WH8085> <WH8799> not; and I was as a dumb man <WH483> that openeth <WH6605> <WH8799> not his mouth <WH6310>.
Thus I was as a man <WH376> that heareth <WH8085> <WH8802> not, and in whose mouth <WH6310> are no reproofs <WH8433>.
For in thee, O YY <WH3068>, do I hope <WH3176> <WH8689>: thou wilt hear <WH6030> <WH8799>, O YY <WH136> my 'Elohim <WH430>.

For I said <WH559> <WH8804>, Hear me, lest otherwise they should rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> over me: when my foot <WH7272> slippeth <WH4131> <WH8800>, they magnify <WH1431> <WH8689> themselves against me.
For I am ready <WH3559> <WH8737> to halt <WH6761>, and my sorrow <WH4341> is continually <WH8548> before me.
For I will declare <WH5046> <WH8686> mine iniquity <WH5771>; I will be sorry <WH1672> <WH8799> for my sin <WH2403>.
But mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> are lively <WH2416>, and they are strong <WH6105> <WH8804>: and they that hate <WH8130> <WH8802> me wrongfully <WH8267> are multiplied <WH7231> <WH8804>.
They also that render <WH7999> <WH8764> evil <WH7451> for good <WH2896> are mine adversaries <WH7853> <WH8799>; because I follow <WH7291> <WH8800> the thing that good <WH2896> is.
Forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> me not, O YY <WH3068>: O my 'Elohim <WH430>, be not far <WH7368> <WH8799> from me.
Make haste <WH2363> <WH8798> to help <WH5833> me, O YY <WH136> my salvation <WH8668>.
